column5: I moved back up north last year after spending 10 years in the south.  No offence to the Southern Ontario folks, but I'm real glad to be back home (first 38 years of my life were in Elliot Lake).  Anyway, I've actually got vacation time this year, and I'm wondering where would be the best places in Lake Superior Provincial Park to catch brookies in August.
Thanks solopaddler.  I'm new here, but I don't see a message in my mailbox (yet)
Thanks solopaddler.  Got it now, but I couldn't get the reply to work.  I'd appreciate any and all suggestions for brookie fishing in the sault - wawa area.  Not just summer fishing either....
